remarks: Construct 2 new layers on top of 2 given atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2012.)
statement:
3dim0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
3dim0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
3dim0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
3dim2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> E. r e. A E. s e. A ( -. r .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ -. s .<_ ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ r ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ r s $.
$d .\/ r s $.
$d A r s $.
$d A r s $.
$d P r s $.
$d Q r s $.
